message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product at a price of $12,000.  I believe it holds significant value and this offer reflects that.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but I am only able to offer $9,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your position, but I'm looking for a price closer to my initial offer.  Would you consider $11,000?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am still unable to meet you halfway at $11,000. My maximum offer remains at $9,000.
